about.summary: Provides taxonomic classes for groupings of taxonomic names without data, and those with data. Methods provided are "taxonomically aware", in that they know about ordering of ranks, and methods that filter based on taxonomy also filter associated data.

Provides taxonomic classes for groupings of taxonomic names without data, and those with data. Methods provided are "taxonomically aware", in that they know about ordering of ranks, and methods that filter based on taxonomy also filter associated data.

name: r-taxa
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.4.2" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-taxa
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/taxa_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/taxa/taxa_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: c35f83a2315c43220f7a54df29e8b0f91d46311cb0905074d36f7622fe8b63ed

build:
  merge_build_host: true  # [win]
  number: 2
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-r6
    - r-crayon
    - r-dplyr
    - r-jsonlite
    - r-knitr
    - r-lazyeval
    - r-magrittr
    - r-rlang
    - r-stringr
    - r-taxize
    - r-tibble
    - r-tidyr
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-r6
    - r-crayon
    - r-dplyr
    - r-jsonlite
    - r-knitr
    - r-lazyeval
    - r-magrittr
    - r-rlang
    - r-stringr
    - r-taxize
    - r-tibble
    - r-tidyr

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('taxa')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('taxa')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/ropensci/taxa
  license: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: Provides taxonomic classes for groupings of taxonomic names without data, and those with data. Methods provided are "taxonomically aware", in that they know about ordering of ranks, and methods that filter based on taxonomy also filter associated data.
  license_family: MIT

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: taxa
# Type: Package
# Title: Taxonomic Classes
# Description: Provides taxonomic classes for groupings of taxonomic names without data, and those with data. Methods provided are "taxonomically aware", in that they know about ordering of ranks, and methods that filter based on taxonomy also filter associated data.

# VignetteBuilder: knitr

# Encoding: UTF-8
